body_html: My thought in implementing this wouldn't be something quite as nice as what Python currently has, but it would be enough to build a graph and train it. During the graph building phase, the individual elements would be added to a JSON string, and then the graph could be built based off the JSON string and checked for errors using the info we get from parsing the op list.

body: My thought in implementing this wouldn't be something quite as nice as what Python currently has, but it would be enough to build a graph and train it. During the graph building phase, the individual elements would be added to a JSON string, and then the graph could be built based off the JSON string and checked for errors using the info we get from parsing the op list.
